title: 84/376/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 July 1984 concerning the implementation by the Federal Republic of Germany of certain measures to adjust capacity in the fisheries sector (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 6 July 1984
concerning the implementation by the Federal Republic of Germany of certain measures to adjust capacity in the fisheries sector
(Only the German text is authentic)
(84/376/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The measures which the Federal Republic of Germany intends to take to implement a financial aid scheme for measures involving the temporary reduction of production capacity in the fisheries sector fulfil the conditions for a financial contribution from the Community.
This Decision shall not apply to national aid referred to in Article 12 of Directive 83/515/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1984.
For the Commission
Giorgios CONTOGEORGIS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 290, 22. 10. 1983, p. 15.
